articles.author: The Indian Express
articles.title: Ready to work with new US govt under Trump: China’s Xi tells Joe Biden at APEC
articles.description: Xi didn’t take Trump’s name but appeared to signal that the political rhetoric used by the president-elect during the presidential campaign could send the US-China relationship into another valley.
articles.content: In the final meeting as the President of the United States, Joe Biden met Chinese President Xi Jinping at the annual Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit and Xi told Biden that Beijing is “ready to work” with the new US administration under Presi... [2101 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump Administration's Bold Picks and Strategic Moves Stir Controversy
articles.description: The Trump transition team reveals potential appointments including a former Uber executive for Transportation Secretary and an oil CEO for Energy Secretary. Meanwhile, utilities urge preservation of clean energy credits, and concerns arise over Elon Musk's alleged calls with Russian officials. Further cabinet selections draw significant attention and controversy.
articles.content: President-elect Donald Trump's latest cabinet picks are generating buzz, from a former Uber executive for Transportation Secretary to an oil industry CEO for Energy Secretary. Sources say these choices highlight Trump's focus on business-savvy leader... [694 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Global Tensions and Calls for Climate Action Dominate News Briefs
articles.description: Global tensions rise as G20 diplomats face challenges on climate and Ukraine. Iran denies Elon Musk meeting, while unrest continues in Abkhazia. UN climate chief urges G20 leaders for financial support. Xi Jinping commits to work with Trump team, and Greek PM ousted over dissent. Israeli strikes cause casualties in Gaza.
articles.content:
In a tense geopolitical atmosphere, G20 diplomats struggled with differences on climate pay, taxes, and the Ukraine war ahead of their summit. The diplomatic deadlock comes as the UN's COP29 discussions focus on financing climate efforts.
Amid region... [584 chars]

articles.title: Trump nominates fracking magnate and climate skeptic as energy secretary
articles.description: US President-elect Donald Trump nominated fracking magnate and climate change skeptic Chris Wright as energy secretary on Saturday, tasking him with
articles.content:
US President-elect Donald Trump nominated fracking magnate and climate change skeptic Chris Wright as energy secretary on Saturday, tasking him with “cutting red tape” which the new administration hopes will drive investment in fossil fuels.

articles.author: Sky News
articles.title: Xi Jinping says China is 'ready to work' with Donald Trump during last meeting with Joe Biden
articles.description: During his campaign, Donald Trump said he would enact a blanket 60% tariff on US imports of Chinese goods.
articles.content:
Joe Biden has met with Xi Jinping for the last time as US president, where the Chinese leader said he is "ready to work" with Donald Trump.
Speaking at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation forum in Lima, Peru, Mr Biden said the US and China's relati... [2262 chars]

articles.title: Trump is determined to see Gaetz confirmed as AG despite controversies
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump is pressing forward with his decision to put forward former Rep. Matt Gaetz as attorney general, despite widespread unease on Capitol Hill about entrusting the Justice Department to a figure with limited legal experience who has recently faced investigations into allegations of sexual misconduct.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump's Energy Pick: The Rise of Chris Wright
articles.description: Donald Trump has chosen Chris Wright, a campaign donor and fossil fuel advocate, as energy secretary in a future administration. Wright's nomination reinforces Trump's agenda for US energy dominance. Environmental groups oppose the choice, citing Wright's support for increased fossil fuel production.
articles.content: In a bold move, President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Chris Wright as energy secretary for his anticipated second administration. Wright, a prominent figure in the fossil fuel sector and top executive at Denver-based Liberty Energy, is known for... [851 chars]

articles.description: Wright has denied that climate change presents a global crisis that needs to be addressed through a transition away from fossil fuels.

articles.title: Charting a New Course: US-China Relations in the Trump Era
articles.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping met with US President Joe Biden at the APEC summit, projecting ahead to the incoming Trump administration. Xi emphasized the significance of maintaining stable China-US relations amidst uncertainties over Trump's 'America first' policies, urging for cooperation to prevent geopolitical tensions.
